description.name: Hostel Marilena
description.description: Cheap accomodation in Dragolm for anyone. Good connection with city centre via public transport. Cyclicsts, backpackers welcome. Reception is open 24/7.

shared-room-4.name: Four-bed shared room
shared-room-4.description: All rooms are equipped with safes. Some of them have a window.

shared-room-12.name: Twelve-bed shared room
shared-room-12.description: All rooms have windows and are equipped with safes. In each room, there are six bunk beds.

shared-room-4-2018.name: Four-bed shared room (2018)
shared-room-4-2018.description: Price per person per night for the four bed shared room. Cleaning fee not included.

shared-room-12-2018.name: Twelve-bed shared room (2018)
shared-room-12-2018.description: Price per person per night for the twelve bed shared room. Cleaning fee not included.

shared-room-4-2019.name: Four-bed shared room (2019)
shared-room-4-2019.description: Price per person per night for the four bed shared room. Cleaning fee not included.

shared-room-12-2019.name: Twelve-bed shared room (2019)
shared-room-12-2019.description: Price per person per night for the twelve bed shared room. Cleaning fee not included.
